directions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add breadcrumbs; toast until they just start to gain color, 3 to 5 minutes. Add garlic and salt. Stir in more breadcrumbs if the mixture is too wet; add a little more oil if too dry. Toast until golden brown, 2 to 4 minutes more.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
title: Vegan Parmesan Cheese Substitute
